Title: Dunham 8000 Works Waterproof 8 Inch Plain Toe Wheat
Description:
Men's Safety & Work
Insulated/Waterproof/Slip Resistant/Stability
Colors: Wheat
Last: Padded collar and tongue reduce irritation while adding extra cushioning
Origin: Nylon shank offers stability and flexibility
Components: Slip-resistant, oil-resistant rubber outsole helps to keep you steady
Outsole: Removable footbed offers advanced comfort and cushioning, and accommodates your own orthotics as needed.
Upper: Thinsulate® 400g provides added warmth and comfort
Midsole: Seam-sealed waterproof construction and waterproof membrane help to keep your feet dry
Previous: ESR-TESTER ANSI-Z41 PT99 helps to prevent electric shock hazards
Technology: ASTM F2913-19 and SATRA TM144 in Dry, Wet, Oil, Oil/Wet Conditions for slip-resistance
Other: Lace-up closure for a secure fit
